_header: I conjure them in the name of the father
Bibliographic Ghosts: Oxford, Bodleian Library Laud misc. 685 (SC 817), f. 205: possibly confused with 1462.
_description: A charm against thieves — in couplets

CULAdd5943.First Lines:
I conioure hem in the name of the ffader and sone and holy gostin
                    hem ys vertu Alther most…
CULAdd5943.Last Lines:
…Lord ihesu Graunte me þysAs ȝe ben in heven
                    blyus
CULAdd5943.Note:
18 lines, followed by Latin couplet, Versus disperibus meritis /
                        pendent tria corpora ramis…; immediately follows 1548 without a
                    break.
